trans-unit.source: Represents an issuer name registry that maintains a list of trusted issuers loaded from elements in the application configuration file that associate each issuer name to the X.509 certificate that is needed to verify the signature of tokens produced by the issuer.
trans-unit.target: 表示簽發者名稱登錄，其中會維護一份從應用程式組態檔中載入的信任簽發者清單，檔案中江美個簽發者的名稱與 X.509 憑證建立關聯性，驗證簽發者所產生之權杖簽署時需要此憑證。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry> class maintains a dictionary of trusted issuers by mapping the certificate of each trusted issuer to a name that refers to that issuer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry>類別會維護所指的是該簽發者的名稱對應的每個受信任的簽發者憑證的受信任簽發者的字典。

trans-unit.source: The certificates are specified using the ASN.1 encoded form of the thumbprint.
trans-unit.target: 憑證會指定使用 ASN.1 編碼的憑證指紋的格式。

trans-unit.source: The issuer name can be any string, as long as it is unique within the scope of the application.
trans-unit.target: 簽發者名稱可以是任何字串，只要它是唯一的應用程式範圍內。

trans-unit.source: This dictionary can be accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以透過存取此字典<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The class can only resolve X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 此類別只可以解決 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: The map of trusted issuers is specified in a configuration file by adding entries under the [<trustedIssuers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 將底下的項目新增組態檔中指定的受信任簽發者對應[ <trustedIssuers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md)項目。

trans-unit.source: The `<trustedIssuers>` element is a child element of the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element and it is valid when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry> class is specified in the `type` attribute of that element.
trans-unit.target: `<trustedIssuers>`元素是子元素[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)項目，而且這是有效的時機<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry>中指定類別`type`該項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the documentation for each of these elements in the [WIF Configuration Schema](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d4f6d76-49a5-4bad-b345-097b2e2844e9).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱各項目中的文件[WIF 組態結構描述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d4f6d76-49a5-4bad-b345-097b2e2844e9)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about issuer name registries, see the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需簽發者名稱登錄的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can derive from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry> to implement your own configuration based issuer name registry.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從衍生<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry>來實作您自己的組態架構的簽發者名稱登錄。

trans-unit.source: Which methods you override will depend upon your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 您覆寫的方法視您的實作。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A> method to load configuration from a custom configuration schema.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A>從自訂組態結構描述載入組態的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following XML shows configuration for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry> added for a collection of security token handlers.
trans-unit.target: 下列 XML 顯示設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry>加入集合的安全性權杖處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The `<trustedIssuers>` element behaves like a classic .NET configuration collection, allowing the `<add>`, `<delete>` and `<clear>` elements as child elements.
trans-unit.target: `<trustedIssuers>`行為類似傳統的.NET 組態集合的項目允許`<add>`，`<delete>`和`<clear>`子項目的項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: ASN.1 encoded form of the issuer's certificate thumbprint.
trans-unit.target: ASN.1 編碼形式的簽發者憑證指模。

trans-unit.source: The name of the issuer.
trans-unit.target: 簽發者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Adds an issuer to the dictionary of trusted issuers.
trans-unit.target: 將簽發者加入至受信任簽發者的字典。

trans-unit.source: You can call this method to add issuers to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers%2A> dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫這個方法可加入至簽發者<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers%2A>字典。

trans-unit.source: In derived classes, you can call this method from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A> method to add issuers to the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中，您可以呼叫這個方法從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A>方法，將簽發者加入至字典。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificateThumbprint" /> is <see langword="null" /> or empty.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificateThumbprint" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或是空的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" /> or empty.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或是空的。

trans-unit.source: The issuer specified by <paramref name="certificateThumbprint" /> has already been configured.
trans-unit.target: 已經設定<paramref name="certificateThumbprint" />所指定的簽發者。

trans-unit.source: (The issuer already exists in the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers" /> dictionary.)
trans-unit.target: (簽發者已存在 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers" /> 字典中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the dictionary of trusted issuers that have been configured for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得已針對執行個體設定之受信任簽發者的字典。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary that contains the trusted issuers.
trans-unit.target: 包含受信任簽發者的字典。

trans-unit.source: The key to the dictionary is the ASN.1 encoded form of the thumbprint of the trusted issuer's certificate and the value is the issuer name.
trans-unit.target: 字典的索引鍵是指紋的 ASN.1 編碼格式的受信任簽發者憑證，而值是指紋的簽發者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The dictionary contains the issuers that were specified in configuration and any additional issuers that have been added with the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.AddTrustedIssuer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 字典中包含組態中所指定的簽發者並新增任何其他簽發者<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.AddTrustedIssuer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The security token for which the issuer name is requested.
trans-unit.target: 要為其要求發行者名稱的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Should be assignable as <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 應該要指派為<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the issuer name associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" /> by mapping the certificate thumbprint to a name in the trusted issuers dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與指定<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" />相關的簽發者名稱，方法是對應憑證指紋與信任簽發者字典中的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The issuer name if an entry for the certificate thumbprint of the token exists in the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers" /> dictionary; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果<see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers" />字典中存在權杖憑證指紋的項目, 則為簽發者名稱；否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation searches the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers%2A> dictionary for the thumbprint of the X.509 certificate specified in `securityToken`.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作搜尋<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers%2A>字典中指定的 X.509 憑證的指紋`securityToken`。

trans-unit.source: If an entry is found, the issuer name is returned; otherwise, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到項目，則會傳回簽發者名稱。否則，`null`傳回。

trans-unit.source: If `securityToken` is not assignable from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`securityToken`無法從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>，`null`傳回。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityToken" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityToken" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The XML that represents the map of trusted issuers that is specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 代表組態檔中所指定的受信任簽發者的對應的 XML。

trans-unit.source: Loads the trusted issuers from configuration.
trans-unit.target: 從組態載入信任的簽發者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A> method is called by the configuration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A>設定基礎結構會呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, the `nodelist` will contain the top-level child elements of the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法時，`nodelist`會包含最上層子項目的[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)從組態檔項目。

trans-unit.source: Each of these may, in turn, contain attributes or child elements depending on the configuration schema you define for your derived class.
trans-unit.target: 每一種可能，接著，會包含屬性或子項目，視您為您衍生的類別定義組態結構描述。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the configuration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 設定基礎結構會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation loads configuration from a [<trustedIssuers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md) element (configured under the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element).
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會載入組態從[ <trustedIssuers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md)項目 (設定之下[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)項目)。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to provide support for your own custom configuration elements in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫此方法以提供您自己的自訂組態項目，衍生類別中的支援。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="customConfiguration" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="customConfiguration" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The configuration contains one or more elements that are not recognized.
trans-unit.target: 組態包含一或多個無法辨識的項目。
